uvi.description:
drm/amd/display: Fix potential memory leak in DMUB hw_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.45 by commit 9e8c2af010463197315fa54a6c17e74988b5259c. For more details please see the references link.
